name: Fanfare Python/Django Website
description: This was my Capstone project for my General Assembly Full Stack Software Engineering program. I got the inspiration after talking to a friend of mine, who is a big fan of certain celebrities. Here you can browse photos, videos, blind items, articles, and a message board about the celebrity. You can also leave comments on each with your own thoughts.

name: Bob's Burgers React Character Index
description: While looking through potential API databases that I could use for my project, I stumbled upon one with a lot of information about 300+ characters featured on the animated show 'Bob's Burgers'. I thought this could be a fun choice, especially because the styling would allow for a lot of creative liberties.
technologies: Javascript, Node, React, CSS, Dotenv, Mongoose

name: Spiel Embedded Javascript Blog
description: I created this blog in tandem with 2 other software engineers. We chose to work on a blog format, so that we could have several elements that we worked with, including creating multiple indexes and keywords by which users are able to find blogs.

name: Memory Matching Javascript Game
description: My very first project that I created as part of my General Assembly course was a Memory Matching Game, using Javascript. This project took around a day to create the base for, and I spent additional time styling and making sure the game looked visual appealing for users.
